name: Pietro Fittipaldi
introduction: Pietro Fittipaldi da Cruz (born 25 June 1996 in Miami, Florida, United States) is an American-born Brazilian racing driver who currently serves as a test driver for the Haas team. He is a grandson of two-time World Champion Emerson Fittipaldi and nephew to Christian Fittipaldi and Max Papis. He has been part of the Ferrari Driver Academy, and has raced in DTM and in the F3 Asian Championship.
